attributes.action: Translate pm.gov.uk and it's subdomains in their entirety into Welsh, Scottish Gaelic and Irish Gaelic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I noticed while browsing this site that there were no links to versions of it in the native British languages and that it was only available in the immigrant Germanic language of the Anglo-Saxons. The government is obliged by Welsh law to provide this site in Welsh, and I would also like to see it in the two forms of Gaelic spoken in Scotland and Northern Ireland. Britain should promote it's indigenous languages as much as possible and in the spirit of the EU Charter for Regional or Minority Languages
